# Introduccion a Altair


## Importar el dataset

```{python}
import altair as alt
from vega_datasets import data
cars = data.cars()
print(cars.head())
```

## Visualización en Altair

### Visualización scatterplot

```{python}

alt.Chart(cars).mark_point().encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()
#interactive: zoom, brush

```

### Visualización scatterplot con color

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point(filled=True).encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    color="Origin",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()

```

### Visualización scatterplot con color


```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_point(filled=True).encode(
    x="Miles_per_Gallon",
    y="Horsepower",
    color="Origin",
    shape="Origin",
    tooltip=["Name","Origin","Miles_per_Gallon","Horsepower"]
).interactive()

```

### Agregaciones

Gráfico de barras

`count()` de cada una de los origines
```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin',sort='-y'),
    alt.Y('count()')
)

```

`mean()` de cada una de los origines

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_bar().encode(
    alt.X('Origin',sort='-y'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)'),
    tooltip=['Origin','mean(Weight_in_lbs)']
).properties(
    width=200,
    height=200
)
```

Gráfico lineal

```{python}
alt.Chart(cars).mark_line(point=True).encode(
    alt.X('Year'),
    alt.Y('mean(Weight_in_lbs)'),
    alt.Color('Origin')
).properties(
    width=600
).interactive()
```
